nodes.text: This unidentified Pantoran guard was assigned to protect Chairman Chi Cho during the Battle of Orto Plutonia.

Prior to the battle, this Pantoran Guard accompanied Chairman Cho, Senator Chuchi, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Captain Rex, and Anakin Skywalker to Orto Plutonia to investigate the disappearance of a clone security force. When it was discovered that the Talz were responsible for killing the clone troopers, tensions rose between the Talz and the Pantoran forces. Soon the Pantoran-Talz war erupted and this Pantoran became one of the many casualties when he was hit with a Talz spear while protecting the chairman. The Talz soldier that eliminated him would later be shot dead by another guard.
